infobox.Japanese title:: 葡萄畑に薔薇の花  (Budō Hata ni Bara no Hana)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Tetsuo Gotō as Detective Momoi  Tomoyuki Dan as Akihiro Yamaguchi  Takayuki Sakazume as Tomoaki Mizumachi  Atsushi Kisaichi as Shuuji Takashina  Kumiko Nishihara as Yurika Suwayama  Keiichi Sonobe as Kengo Suwayama

sections.Case: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are at a winery in Kofu, Yamanashi Prefecture.
